Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains with refrain ‘Of thy conforte lete vs not mys’, and burden: ‘O Virgyne marie quene of blis / Of thy conforte lete vs not mys’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O closed gate of EzechiellO plentevous mounte of
                    daniel…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Maye come to blis celestiallOf thy conforte lete vs not
                    mys

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 174-5.

            1977: 143; 1977, 127.
